items.text: 早上好，中国，现在我有冰淇淋。
items.title: Good morning, China. Now I have ice cream.
items.pinyin: zǎoshang hǎo, zhōngguó, xiànzài wǒ yǒu bīngqílín.
items.pronounce: dzaow-shung how, jong-gwor, syan-dzai waw yo bing-chee-lin.
items.comment: A greeting followed by a statement about having ice cream.

items.title: I like ice cream.
items.comment: Used to express your liking for ice cream.
